sub-list.code:
npx create-react-app my-app
cd my-app
npm start

sub-list.name: Importing components
sub-list.description:
Replace Todos with class name 
 If you change the path where 
components are stored please update accordingly
 while using it in the render method please use tags like <Todos />

sub-list.name: Passing props
sub-list.code:
<Todos
         todos={this.state.todos}
         markComplete={this.markComplete}
         delTodo={this.delTodo}
 />;

 //This can be accessed in the called componenet using 
this.props.todos

sub-list.name: Saving variables in State
sub-list.description: Inside the Render method there is a method called State. Declare your variables there.

sub-list.name: For each loop substitute
Styling
Adding classes
sub-list.code:
To add classes in react application 

Just add className as attribute instead of class

Example #1[direct]

<div className="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-4">

Example #2[conditional]

<div className={ this.state.active? "bg-light light-on": "bg-light light-off" } />

Example #3[variables]

<div className={variableContainingClassAsAString} />

sub-list.name: Add Bootstrap
sub-list.code:
1.run commnad in cmd
npm install bootstrap --save

2.after install add this to index.js
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';

sub-list.name: Migration
sub-list.code:
1. Move all of the folders (css/, fonts/, img/, js/) to my-reactapp/public folder 

2. Copy content of index.html of Html to index.html of React(present in the public folder)

3. Change class to className(with camel toe)

Reference : https://medium.com/javascript-in-plain-english/how-to-convert-any-web-page-to-reactjs-9740f1ba15db
